```{r, message=FALSE}
# **************************************************************************** #
# ***************                Library                       *************** #
# **************************************************************************** #
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(fuzzyjoin)
library(dplyr)
library(sjmisc)
library(data.table)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}

# pe_codes: import icd-code information (1:1 structure)
source("~/ehr-preeclampsia-model/code/utils/params.R")

# delivery_final_v8: import linked delivery data (1:1 structure)
load("~/ehr-preeclampsia-model/data/processed/delivery_linked_v9.rda")
load("~/ehr-preeclampsia-model/data/raw/mom_labs.rda")

```

```{r}

data_labs=df
#add year of delivery to mom ID
data_labs$lab_date<-as.Date(data_labs$lab_date)

data_labs=data_labs%>%
  mutate(year=lubridate::year(lab_date))

data_labs$part_id<-paste(data_labs$part_id, data_labs$year, sep = "_")

#select mom ID, lab date, and lab type/result
data_labs=data_labs%>%
  select(part_id, lab_date, lab_name, lab_result, lab_unit)

```

```{r}

#Filter labs for variables included in model

data_labs=data_labs%>%
  filter(grepl("ALT |AST |CREATININE|HEMATOCRIT|HEMOGLOBIN|MEAN CORPUSCULAR HEMOGLOBIN|MEAN CORPUSCULAR HEMOGLOBIN CONC|MEAN CORPUSCULAR VOLUME|MEAN PLATELET VOLUME|PLATELET COUNT|RED BLOOD COUNT|RED CELL DISTRIBUTION WIDTH|WHITE BLOOD CELL COUNT", lab_name))

delivery_data<-delivery_final_v9
names(data_labs)[names(data_labs) == "part_id"] <- "mom_id"

# [X] ALT
# select lab test done around the first diagnosis
ALT = data_labs%>%
  filter(grepl("ALT", lab_name))%>%
  mutate(lab_result = as.numeric(lab_result))%>%
  select(mom_id, lab_date,lab_result)%>%
  inner_join(delivery_data,by=c("mom_id"))%>%
  filter(lab_date <=  perinatal_dx_date+5&lab_date>perinatal_dx_date-5)%>%
  group_by(mom_id)%>%
  arrange(lab_date)%>%
  select(mom_id, lab_result)%>%
  slice(1)

names(ALT)[names(ALT) == "lab_result"] <- "alt_lab_result"

delivery_final_v9 = delivery_final_v9%>%left_join(ALT, by=c("mom_id"))
```
